incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of service of 5 minutes during this operation. Service improvement : This operation has the objectif of fixing an issue experienced to an environment outage on P19.

Start time : 14/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a network maintenance on our backbone between Marseilles and Singapore

Start time : 14/09/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be upgrading a network link.
